description.narrative: The project development objective is to improve learning facilities and teaching quality in selected public primary and junior secondary schools in project counties.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Annual Work Plans, PA, Schedule, Section I.A.2 | Description :The Project Implementing Entity shall cause theProject Counties to prepare Annual Work Plans, acceptable to the Bank, and to implement the Project in accordance with such plans.| Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Mid-term review, PA, Schedule, Section II.A.2 | Description :The Project Implementing Entity shall prepare,under terms of reference satisfactory to the Bank, and furnish to the Bank no later than December 1, 2020, a consolidated mid-termreview report for the Project. | Due Date :15-Mar-2021

Finance Agreement :Operations Manual, PA, Schedule, Section I.A.3 | Description :Throughout the implementation of the Project, theProject Implementing Entity shall apply, and cause the Project Counties to apply, the Project Operations Manual in a mannersatisfactory to the Bank.
